HediffDef.label: burning steel: aura
HediffDef.description: Reveals nearby sources of metal by tracing fine blue lines through the air. Each line points toward a metal object — coin, armor, blade — waiting to be pushed. These lines shimmer with the tension of potential force, visible only to those burning Steel.

HediffDef.label: Burning steel: bubble
HediffDef.description: The Allomancer is generating a field of repelling force using Steel, subtly redirecting incoming projectiles. Ranged attackers find it harder to land shots.

HediffDef.label: Burning steel: bubble
HediffDef.description: This pawn is in mid-air, having pushed off the ground with Allomantic Steel. They are temporarily immune to ground-based hazards and cannot be targeted in melee.
